_sText:
A simple map. I'm experimenting with low gravity gameplay. With low gravity both humans and zombies have a big advantage. I'll try to make a map with sort of low gravity jumping complex.

The main idea is jumping around and try to survive, or preventing zombies from entering a platform. I'll try to make a map with sort of low gravity jumping complex.

I need to see how this map works on other servers with different knockback, so I can improve the balance. Currently it might be a bit few enterances for the highest platform.

Any suggestions, improvements or gameplay ideas would be great.

--- UPDATE ---
- Improved brightness.
- I need to redesign the layout because it's a bit laggy with 25+ players. 
- If anyone have more ideas for low gravity gameplay I would like to know. :)

Made by: Richard Helgeby (Norway)
